description: Variation of the wording of condition 9 (opening hours) attached to the original planning permission (ref 17/4877) to read as follows:'On Sunday to Wednesday the premises shall not be used for the preparation or sale of food and drink or for events other than between the hours of 07.00 and 23.00 and shall be cleared, with all ancillary activity completed, within 45 minutes of closing time.On Thursday, Friday and Saturday, the premises, with the exception of 'the BoxBar' (as identified as 'BeatBox' on drawing no. BPW-BDP-(0-)AP010A Rev R02), shall not be used for the preparation or sale of food and drink or for events other than between the hours of 07.00 and 23.00 and shall be cleared, with all ancillary activity completed, within 45 minutes of 23.00. On Thursday, Friday and Saturday 'the BoxBar' shall not be used for the preparation or sale of food and drink or for events other than between the hours of 07.00 and 01.00 and shall be cleared, with all ancillary activity completed, within 15 minutes of 01.00. During the period from 23.00 to 01.00 the capacity of the BoxBar shall be limited to no more than 250 customers.The extended opening hours of the BoxBar hereby approved shall only be implemented for a period of twelve months (unless an alternative temporary or permanent period has been agreed by the Local Planning Authority), commencing from the date on which the premises reopens to general visiting customers following its closure in connection with the 2020 Covid-19 pandemic. Notification of the date of commencement shall be submitted in writing by the applicant to the Local Planning Authority on or before the date the premises reopens to general visiting customers.No deliveries to, or collections from, the premises shall take place before 07.00 am.Reason: To protect the amenities of nearby residential occupiers.'Full Planning Permission reference 17/4877 dated 19 February 2018 was for the Erection of a food and beverage and retail mall to provide restaurant/cafâ€š, drinking establishment and shop units (use classes A1/A3/A4), an event space (use class D2), external food units (use class A5), ancillary management and storage units, associated servicing areas, provision of cycle parking and placement of signage for a temporary period of 10 years
